computer.cpu: Z80 at 4 Mhz and 6502 at 1.02 Mhz
computer.description:
Well, we haven't got much information about this one. We just have an advertisement in a newspaper. It says it's a handheld Apple compatible. Well it seems quite large for a handheld. Under "operating system", there is: IMC version 5.1, APPLE DOS, PRODOS and CP/M 2.2 compatible, there is also MS-DOS 2.0 in option. Under "storage": 1 "slimsize" disk drive with controller, capacity of 143kb.
That's all...
computer.keyboard: Full stroke keyboard with numeric keypad
computer.name: IMCE Junior
